name: Tetrimania
description:
A little unique game about TETRIS. There is a player with platformer movement, which has to avoid being squashed by the Tetris blocks by jumping on them, and the tetris blocks have to avoid reaching the height limit.

You gain points by clearing rows and collecting coins.

CONTROLS:

player movement  (A - left   D - right   SPACE - jump)

Tetrimonio movement (J - left   K - right   K - down   I - rotate)
